The image of the donut with: Muslim writing" was actually created by Rosanna Pansino in June 2015 and was not a recent occurrence as claimed.
The writing on the donut was in Orkish: a fictional language created by J.R.R. Tolkien for his Lord of the Rings trilogy, and not any form of Muslim writing.
Similar Lord of the Rings: themed donuts have been shared on the internet before, indicating that this was not a unique or significant event.
